chattingDescription:
Whether you are new or experienced in stock control,
BoxHero is the key to simple yet efficient inventory management.
customerDesc:
More than 30,000+ teams are
already inventorying on BoxHero.
customerSectionTitle:
Transforming how every business does inventory!
Hundreds of different industries!
customerTitle: Use BoxHero in any industry of your choice
featureDescLocationManagement: Multiple locations all under one team
featuresTitle:
That’s not all.
BoxHero has many functions to choose from!
featuresTitleMobile:
That’s not all.

keyFeature1Menu3: Collaborate effectively with your team members!
keyFeature1Title:
Mobile or Desktop?
Use them ALL in Real-Time!
keyFeature2Menu1: Adjust your stock quantity whenever you need!
keyFeature2Menu2: Sell and ship products as soon as you order!
keyFeature2Title:
Stock In and Out with
a single click!
keyFeature3Menu1: Quickly scan from the app for accurate stock in and outs!
keyFeature3Menu2: No labels for your products? Generate them from BoxHero!
keyFeature3Menu3: Share all of your information in real-time!
keyFeature4Menu1: Order → Stock in → Sell → Stock out all at once!
keyFeature4Menu3: Sync with Shopify and streamline your tasks!
pageDescription: From desktop to mobile, efficiently manage you inventory needs with BoxHero. Just what you need for your inventory management. Come try it out - Free!
salesManagementDesc:
No more repetitiveness.
BoxHero is all you need for managing order ➞ stock in ➞ sales ➞ stock out process seamlessly.
startNowDescription:
Try the Business Plan with your team for 30-days free trial.
Single users can use BoxHero for free.
No quotation required. BoxHero is that easy to use.
teamPlayDesc:
Easy invite, control team roles, transparent history!
With BoxHero, teamwork is more productive than ever.
